comment._content:
Is it a collection box for the sick and poor of the parish.
If it was a post box it would have the reigning monarchs (when commissioned) emblem.

comment.author: 29809546@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/8468254@N02] If it's freeman's Journal, or the Belfast News-letter, then yes. If it's a skullcracker, then no.

comment.author: 100701727@N08
comment._content: Its a box where people can put their old newspapers for the poor people to read when they are staying in hospital for a few days. Its charity / recycling for the hospital patients.
